p: Methanol (Guandong Chemical Reagent, China), propylene glycol (BDH Chemicals Ltd., Poole England), triethanolamine (BDH Chemicals Ltd., Poole England), methyl paraben (BDH Chemicals Ltd., Poole England) and carbopol 940 (Guangdong Chemical Reagent, China), All chemical reagents for phytochemical screening and evaluation were of analytical grade. Anti-inflammatory assay reagents were obtained from Cayman Chemical, Ann Arbor, MI, USA.
